title: Permanently Banned
body: I just recently got permanently banned and I'm confused as to why maybe I did something without realising it ? My friends don't consider me as a toxic person, I'll say something from time to time but not report worthy a lot of people do and I've never scripted in my life, I don't even know how to download them. My friends also said things about 3 warning bans but I never got them I just got a straight up permanent ban and the email that it said in the message that said it would say why i got banned was never sent to me.

replies.body: i got banned for almost the same reason i aint toxic either i actually win more games than i lose because of this

You can open a ticket at Support.riotgames.com to find out why you were banned. 

Also the duration of the ban can tell you what the ban was for. 

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3047538
